DOC.brief_summary: A 12-Month, Open-Label, Flexible-Dosage Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of GABITRIL Treatment in Adults with Generalized Anxiety Disorder.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of GABITRIL Treatment in Adults With Generalized Anxiety Disorder.
DOC.criteria: Subjects who have completed 10 weeks of doubleblind treatment and the subsequent taper period in 1 of the 3 previous doubleblind studies (studies C6671/3030/AX/US, C6671/3031/AX/US, or C6671/3032/AX/US).
